page.title: 14BIKE DEBATE. PROS & CONS.
page.content: {FOR.}" There is a BMX bike course on our common," says Paul. "The second bump is the best because of the stone but if you land wrong you go into the ferns and usually fall off. It's best to go down the first bump on your back wheel." {GROWN UPS AND CHILDREN IN THE {AREA DON'T ALL AGREE ABOUT WHETHER BMX {BIKES AND MOTOR BIKES ARE A GOOD IDEA. { {AGAINST.}Three people in our class of 21 children think that motor bikes and BMX cycles are dangerous and should be banned. Two boys at school recently had an accident on the way home. One boys pedal was bent and the other boy cracked off half a tooth. Motor bikes make a row. BMXs spoil the common land and scare the sheep, cows, donkeys and horses. { BE CAREFUL ON BIKES.}
